mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile navigation by reducing the size of interactive elements and ensuring touch targets are larger for easier interaction on small screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and leverage browser caching to reduce load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more keyword-rich content on the homepage and optimize meta descriptions and title tags for better search engine ranking.
userExperienceTip: Ensure consistent visual styling across all pages to improve design coherence.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form by reducing the number of steps and making navigation clearer.
tips: Enhance site speed by reducing the number of server requests.
Optimize for better SEO with structured data markup and improved content visibility.
